original: Guus Hiddink is Dutch.
translated: Guus Hiddink est hollandais.

original: The chocolate cake tempted her even though she was dieting.
translated: Le gâteau au chocolat la tenta bien qu'elle soit au régime.

original: Take some exercise every day for your health.
translated: Faites de l'exercice tous les jours pour rester en santé.

original: He cares a lot about his reputation.
translated: Il se préoccupe beaucoup de sa réputation.

original: I didn't sleep so much.
translated: Je n'ai pas dormi tant que ça.

original: It snowed.
translated: Il a neigé.

original: I don't want you to change.
translated: Je ne veux pas que tu changes.

original: I'll take care of you.
translated: Je prendrai soin de vous.

original: Somebody hit me.
translated: Quelqu’un m'a frappé.

original: I felt fine this morning until I noticed what they'd done to me. I'm feeling so aggrieved.
translated: J'étais très bien ce matin jusqu'à ce que je remarque ce qu'elles m'avaient fait. Je me sens tellement chagrinée.

original: One can eat very well in São Paulo.
translated: On mange très bien à São Paulo.

original: Tom's father is my brother.
translated: Le père de Tom est mon frère.

original: We had words again last night, so today we're not speaking.
translated: On s’est encore disputé hier soir, du coup on ne se parle pas aujourd’hui.

original: Does he know how she feels about him?
translated: Sait-il ce qu'elle éprouve à son égard ?

original: It doesn't seem possible, does it?
translated: Ça ne semble pas possible, si ?

original: Tom was heartbroken when Mary passed away.
translated: Tom a eu le cœur brisé quand Mary est morte.

original: One sniff of that stuff was enough to make me sick.
translated: Une simple bouffée de ce truc suffisait à me rendre malade.

original: She was sobbing.
translated: Elle sanglotait.

original: Tom seemed busy.
translated: Tom avait l'air occupé.

original: I think that Tom did that intentionally.
translated: Je pense que Tom a fait cela intentionnellement.

original: How long does it take to go to Okinawa by plane?
translated: Combien de temps cela prend-il pour aller à Okinawa en avion ?

original: Let's do a pregnancy test.
translated: Faisons un test de grossesse.

original: I saw Tom going into the bank.
translated: J'ai vu Tom entrer dans la banque.

original: And what if I say "no"?
translated: Et qu'en est-il, si je dis « non » ?

original: Tom will never agree to that.
translated: Tom n'acceptera jamais cela.

original: We must punish him severely.
translated: Nous devons le punir sévèrement.

original: Tom's parents don't want Tom and Mary to live together until after they are married.
translated: Les parents de Tom ne veulent pas que Tom et Marie vivent ensemble avant leur mariage.

original: She spends a lot of time on the phone.
translated: Elle passe beaucoup de temps au téléphone.

original: Is there anything you want to say?
translated: Y a-t-il quoi que ce soit que vous vouliez dire ?

original: Tom asked Mary what she had bought at the jewelry store.
translated: Tom a demandé à Mary ce qu'elle avait acheté à la bijouterie.

original: They were yours.
translated: Elles étaient les vôtres.

original: I got this bicycle for free.
translated: J'ai eu ce vélo pour rien.

original: What time do you start check-in?
translated: À quelle heure commence l'enregistrement ?

original: The doctor's quick arrival brought about her very speedy recovery.
translated: Le médecin est arrivé en vitesse ce qui lui a permis de se rétablir très rapidement.

original: There are a lot of books in his room.
translated: Il y a beaucoup de livres dans sa chambre.

original: Do you remember that day?
translated: Te souviens-tu de ce jour-là ?

original: I slept better than I did last night.
translated: J'ai mieux dormi que la nuit dernière.

original: What time does the concert start?
translated: À quelle heure commence le concert ?

original: You have only one flaw.
translated: Vous n'avez qu'un défaut.

original: Nobody loves war.
translated: Personne n'aime la guerre.

original: I'm not going to stop.
translated: Je ne vais pas m'arrêter.

original: I like sweets.
translated: J'aime les sucreries.

original: I felt scared.
translated: Je me suis sentis apeurée.

original: The instant he opened the door, he smelt something burning.
translated: Au moment où il ouvrait la porte, il sentit quelque chose brûler.

original: That's fucking cool.
translated: C'est putain de la balle.

original: He is suspected of robbery.
translated: Il est suspecté de vol.

original: This is a rich girl.
translated: C'est une fille riche.

original: I didn't inform them.
translated: Je ne les ai pas informés.

original: This is messed up.
translated: C'est foutu.
